item.title: I got a prob
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

You may already have the cat command on your server. Check. That command will make your character into a king black dragon. It won’t spawn one next to you.

item.title: I got a prob
item.dc:creator: @souleroo souleroo
item.description:
@souleroo wrote:

i where trying to add transforming to my fr33sc4p3 this is the code:

{
if (command.startsWith(“cat”)){
npcId = 50;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if (command.startsWith(“normal”)){
isNpc = false;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

when i added it it had no errors but when i input ::cat i whont transform :eek: if you guys can find any prob whit it please post it here
[br][size=1]Posted on: June 20, 2007, 01:22:18 PM[/size][hr](its in the client.java txy document
